name: General requirements for loans and extensions of credit
text:
PART  III.  LOANS AND EXTENSIONS OF CREDIT

     A financial services loan company shall make loans and extensions of credit that are consistent with prudent lending practices, and in compliance with all applicable federal and state laws. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
Cross References
  Credit sale contracts, finance charges on, see §476-28.
  Foreign lender, exclusion, see §207-11.
  Secured transactions, Uniform Commercial Code, see §490:9-203.
